name: Dragora GNU/Linux-Libre
short_description: Dragora is a trustworthy GNU/Linux-Libre distribution based on the concept of simplicity with the goal of being a multi-purpose operating system. Dragora respects the freedom of the user with the values of free software and provides control to those who use it. It is developed entirely by volunteers and it is published under the terms of the GNU General Public License.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 3.0 (GPLv3)
